org.mockito.verification

Class After

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mockito.verification.VerificationWrapper<VerificationOverTimeImpl>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VerificationAfterDelay, VerificationMode

    public class After
extends VerificationWrapper<VerificationOverTimeImpl>
implements VerificationAfterDelay
    See the javadoc for VerificationAfterDelay

    Typically, you won't use this class explicitly. Instead use timeout() method on Mockito class. See javadoc for VerificationWithTimeout
